> 
> 
> 26 minutes ago, Felger said:
> 
> 
> Probably better to make a new thread at this point, with everything going on on my end, I won't really have the opportunity to regularly update this one.
> 
> 
>

> You and @Nhawks17 should be able to merge and draft releases.
> 

Ok, I'll get in touch with DerpyFirework about the thread. And as of now we only have Read access to the repo, we'd need Write access to be able to merge and draft new releases I believe, I've tried doing a merge but I don't have the option to do so.

>

> Probably better to make a new thread at this point, with everything going on on my end, I won't really have the opportunity to regularly update this one.

> You and @Nhawks17 should be able to merge and draft releases.

I don't think I have the ability to do anything, other than pull requests and such. Unless I'm just blind.

Development of the mod has now moved over to this [new thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/130576-105-realplume-stock-configs-continued-v090-2016123/). If you're looking for that, please go there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
